text: Is there a way to have multiple rows in a single section? An example would be having a full row and then a 1/2 and 1/2 row and they would share the same section styles like a background image.
There doesn’t appear to be a way. I tried building page out and if you want another row, it creates another section, so I’m going to assume the answer is now. I’ll go the custom module route.

Yup, you can. Focus on the drop target “laser beam” that shows up. A shaded “laser beam” indicates that the thing you’re dropping will be “grouped” with the the thing above / below it.
<https://p191.p3.n0.cdn.getcloudapp.com/items/DOu6pLKQ/21877f95-a73f-48dc-b1d6-f4b65002db53.gif?v=c3e9e6f3b8b4a1a52bb444c96824d516>
Oh nice. What does that structure look like when building out dnd templates?
